AFC700ATK

The AFC700ATK is a self supporting NEMA 12 control panel with 4 filtered exhaust fans and inlets for proper cooling. This box includes a Siemens 10” color touch screen, with a Siemens S7-200XP PLC, relay cards, thrermocoupler cards, and a … Continued

Custom Control Systems for Industrial Automation

AFC has been in business for over 40 years building quality controls panels for the Automotive Industry, Aerospace Industry, Industrial, Military, Government, Agricultural, and OEM Accounts. We have knowledge with PLC’s, process control, motor control and automated systems. We can engineer a control system and integrate different technologies to increase productivity and make it user friendly. All control panels that AFC manufactures are ETL listed to UL508a standard, which is the highest industrial control panel standard available. We would like to help you through the process of developing your next automation and control system.

Check out what we’ve built so far, or give us a call for your own quote.

All systems come with complementary phone support.
